describe: Kuwait is a small, oil-rich country located in the Middle East, bordered by Iraq and Saudi Arabia. Known for its modern architecture, cultural heritage, and significant oil reserves, Kuwait plays a crucial role in the global energy market.

cities.name: üèù Kuwait City
cities.geographical_location: Located on the coast of the Persian Gulf in the eastern part of the country.
cities.climate: Kuwait City has a desert climate with extremely hot summers and mild winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Machboos, a spiced rice dish with meat or fish, and Mutabbaq Samak, a fish dish.

cities.name: üèù Salmiya
cities.geographical_location: Situated along the Persian Gulf coast, just southeast of Kuwait City.
cities.climate: Salmiya experiences a desert climate with hot, dry summers and mild winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Seafood dishes, particularly grilled fish and shrimp.
